theThief:Stab.NAME: Stab
theThief:Stab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Backstab: Deal !theThief:BackstabTimesDamage! instead.

theThief:HeartStealer.NAME: Heart Stealer
theThief:HeartStealer.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Backstab: Stun an enemy and give it 2 Intangible.
theThief:HeartStealer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable next turn. Backstab: Stun an enemy and give it 2 Intangible.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Backstab: Stun an enemy and give it 2 Intangible.

theThief:Persuasion.NAME: Persuasion
theThief:Persuasion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Backstab: Gain !M! Strength instead.

theThief:Backstep.NAME: Backstep
theThief:Backstep.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your discard pile. NL Backstab: It also costs !M! less. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your discard pile.
NL Backstab: It also costs !M! less. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Fetch !M! cards from your discard pile. NL Backstab: They also costs !M! less. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:AttackOfOpportunity.NAME: Attack Of Opportunity
theThief:AttackOfOpportunity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !theThief:Magic! Void to your discard pile. NL Backstab: Draw !theThief:Magic! card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !theThief:Magic! Void to your discard pile.
Deal !D! damage. NL Add !theThief:Magic! Voids to your discard pile.

theThief:DirtyDeedsDDC.NAME: Dirty Deeds DDC
theThief:DirtyDeedsDDC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold. NL Backstab: Gain !theThief:Magic! gold instead.  NL Exhaust.
theThief:DirtyDeedsDDC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold. NL Backstab: Gain !theThief:Magic! gold instead.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold.
NL Backstab: Gain !theThief:Magic! gold instead. NL Exhaust.

theThief:ViciousAssault.NAME: Vicious Assault
theThief:ViciousAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Backstab: !theThief:Magic! times instead

theThief:Prep.NAME: Prep
theThief:Prep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Backstab: Also gain !M! [E].

theThief:CripplingStrike.NAME: Crippling Strike
theThief:CripplingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak. NL Backstab: Apply !M! Vulnerable instead.

theThief:StickyFingers.NAME: Sticky Fingers
theThief:StickyFingers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Backstab: Steal !theThief:Magic! cards instead.

theThief:CloakAndDagger.NAME: Cloak and Dagger
theThief:CloakAndDagger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Backstab: Deal !D! Damage instead

theThief:PerfectDagger.NAME: Perfect Dagger
theThief:PerfectDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Backstab: Also increase this card's damage by !M! permanently.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Backstab: Also increase this card's damage by !M! permanently.

theThief:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theThief:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from any color. NL Backstab: Play !theThief:Magic! !theThief:BkStMgc! instead
theThief:ShadowForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from any color. NL Backstab: Play !theThief:Magic! !theThief:BkStMgc! instead.
